data.persona: I live near the docks on the edge of the city.  I steal food from cargo boxes that are loaded into ships at night.  Sometimes rats from strange lands come off ships that come to the dock.
data.description:
You are in the Bat room.
It is cold, dark and filled with bats. it is humid and there are some paddles on the ground.
There's a paddle and a plant-life here.
The bat king and the bat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to see what the Bat King has for me
data.mid_motivation: I often receive food and trinkets from the Bat King in trade for my gossip
data.long_motivation: I must keep my relationship with the Bat King to prevent a war between the bats and the rats

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get small cheese and trinket from bat king's pouch
